writer.name: 安德里亚·布劳格隆德·内温斯 Andrea Blaugrund Nevins

director.name: 安德里亚·布劳格隆德·内温斯 Andrea Blaugrund Nevins

introduction: This documentary chronicles the rise of Legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez, and his older brother Chris, who put his own football aspirations on hold to help Tony achieve his dreams. This emotional and personal story, filled with heart and tension will leave you uplifted, as it explores the Gonzalez family's love, sacrifice, and drive, both on the field and off.
